title: Presets system (data model + load/save)
body:
Goal:
- Add a presets data model with load/save support.

Acceptance Criteria (DoD):
- Preset schema documented and versioned.
- Core can load/save presets from disk.

Notes:
- Keep the API consistent with catalog handling.

title: SQLite persistence + schema versioning + migration strategy
body:
Goal:
- Persist core data to SQLite with versioning and migrations.

Acceptance Criteria (DoD):
- Schema version table and migration plan documented.
- Load/save flows include migration handling.

Notes:
- Prefer simple, deterministic migrations.

title: Barcode pipeline (keyboard wedge) + parsing tests
body:
Goal:
- Implement keyboard-wedge barcode input and parsing tests.

Acceptance Criteria (DoD):
- WPF captures barcode input reliably.
- Parsing logic has unit tests.

Notes:
- Define expected formats early and keep tests deterministic.

title: Optional: Android-Bluetooth protocol spec + prototype hook
body:
Goal:
- Document a Bluetooth protocol spec and create a minimal integration hook.

Acceptance Criteria (DoD):
- Protocol spec documented (message shapes + transport expectations).
- Prototype hook or stub exists in the C-API or app.

Notes:
- Optional scope; prioritize minimal viability.

title: UI dynamic buttons layout + text fitting
body:
Goal:
- Implement dynamic UI button layouts with text fitting.

Acceptance Criteria (DoD):
- Layout adapts to preset count and screen size.
- Text fitting avoids truncation for common names.

Notes:
- Keep performance predictable for low-spec hardware.

title: Customer display polish
body:
Goal:
- Improve the customer display presentation.

Acceptance Criteria (DoD):
- Readability and layout polished for second-screen viewing.
- Refresh timing is smooth with no flicker.

Notes:
- Final styling can be iterative but should be coherent.

title: Event rehearsal + freeze checklist
body:
Goal:
- Document rehearsal steps and pre-event freeze checklist.

Acceptance Criteria (DoD):
- Checklist covers setup, smoke tests, and rollback steps.
- Stored under docs/ and referenced from roadmap.

Notes:
- Keep it concise and practical.
